Class Order

java.lang.Object
app.Order
public class Order extends Object
This class houses the modifications a customer makes to a base drink, and handles the complete price calculations for those selected options.

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order(Drink drink, String size, String sweetness, String ice, Vector<String> toppings)
      Constructs an Order object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      drink - a Drink object of the selected base drink
      size - the selected size of the drink
      sweetness - the selected sweetness of the drink
      ice - the selected ice level of the drink
      toppings - a vector of the selected toppings for the drink

    • calculatePrice

      public float calculatePrice()
      Calculates the total price of the drink based on the base drink's price + size adjustment + addtional topping prices.
      Parameters:
      None -
      Returns:
      the computed total price of the customized drink before taxes and tips

    • addOrderToDatabase

      public void addOrderToDatabase(Database db, float tips, int employeeID)
      Adds the current order to the database, noting the total cost (after tips and tax) and the employee who conducted the order.
      Parameters:
      db - the database connection object
      tips - the tip amount added to the order
      employeeID - the ID of teh employee processing the order
